abstract: Credit Suisse is hiring Vedika Bhandarkar, a veteran investment banker at rival JPMorgan Chase, as head of investment banking for India, the Swiss investment bank said Friday.
snippet: Credit Suisse is hiring Vedika Bhandarkar, a veteran investment banker at rival JPMorgan Chase, as head of investment banking for India, the Swiss investment bank said Friday.
lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse is hiring Vedika Bhandarkar, a veteran investment banker at rival JPMorgan Chase, as head of investment banking for India, the Swiss investment bank said on Friday.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Names Head of India Investment Banking
